ns0:Concept.displayName: Acquired absence of breast and nipple
Acquired absence of unspecified breast and nipple

ns0:DescribedValueSet.ns0:Purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent a unilateral mastectomy where the side was not specified.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) category related to Diagnosis.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with a unilateral mastectomy performed, but the side was not specified. This is a grouping of SNOMED CT and ICD-10-CM codes.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes codes that indicate a bilateral mastectomy or a unilateral mastectomy where the side is specified.)
ns0:DescribedValueSet.ns0:Definition: (2.16.840.1.113883.3.464.1003.198.11.1088:Unilateral Mastectomy, Unspecified Laterality),(2.16.840.1.113883.3.464.1003.198.11.1089:Unilateral Mastectomy, Unspecified Laterality),(2.16.840.1.113883.3.464.1003.198.11.1090:Unilateral Mastectomy, Unspecified Laterality)
